example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (SBAR-PRD (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تتلمذ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN كبير) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الكلاسيكي)) (NP (NOUN_PROP مصطفى) (NOUN_PROP فروخ))))))))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ ثم) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كسر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكلاسيكية) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الافقية)))))

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on kasar-i-v
